title: Jennifer Lopez continues filming for new romantic comedy Marry Me
text:
She has won critical acclaim for her turn as stripper Ramona in the movie, Hustlers.

And Jennifer Lopez, 50, was back to doing what she does best, as she filmed scenes for her upcoming romantic comedy Marry Me in Manhattan on Wednesday night.

Showing off her sensational curves, the multi-talented star was typically glamorous in a figure-hugging red midi-dress.

Jennifer wowed in the shiny bodycon number with eighties-inspired sleeves which showed off her sexy style credentials.

The songstress boosted her height in a pair of towering red Femme LA - Gia PVC heels as she was seen exiting NBC Studios with her co-star John Bradley.

Jennifer lived up to her beauty icon status, as she sported sleek locks and a glamorous coat of make-up.

Game Of Thrones actor John put on a dapper display in a slick navy suit as he stood alongside Jennifer.

According to IMDB, the premise for Marry Me reads: 'A pop superstar is jilted by her rock-star fiancé moments before their wedding at Madison Square Garden, so she marries a random guy from the crowd instead'.

The film also stars Sarah Silverman, Owen Wilson and hunky Colombian singer, Maluma.

J-Lo is somewhat of a romcom queen, with almost a dozen films in the genre under her belt, from The Wedding Planner and Maid In Manhattan to Monster In Law and Out Of Sight.

Currently, the beauty is enjoying some healthy buzz as an actress — her hit film Hustlers is holding steady at 88 percent on Rotten Tomatoes, and her name has even been circulated as a potential early Oscar contender.

Her career is going from strength to strength. Last week, Jennifer Lopez and Shakira were announced as the headliners for the Super Bowl 53 halftime show, which takes place Sunday, February 2 on Fox.

Jennifer is also slated to play Rose Alvarez in the forthcoming NBC musical event Bye Bye Birdie Live.
